title: The LORD Promises Vengeance on Babylon
description:
Readings from:
Habakkuk 2:4-6; 3:16-19a
Today's passages were read by Evan Alexander. Evan is a husband, gather, and youth pastor, serving at Tom's Creek Baptist Church in NE Georgia.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
